```{python}
#| echo: false
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
from pathlib import Path
import sys

# Find project root dynamically
project_root = Path.cwd()
if project_root.name != 'decentralized-institutes-of-health':
    while project_root.name != 'decentralized-institutes-of-health' and project_root.parent != project_root:
        project_root = project_root.parent

# Add paths
sys.path.insert(0, str(project_root / 'brain' / 'book' / 'appendix'))
sys.path.insert(0, str(project_root / 'brain' / 'figures'))

from economic_parameters import calculate_personal_lifetime_wealth_conservative_baseline
from _chart_style import (
    setup_chart_style, add_watermark, clean_spines, add_png_metadata,
    COLOR_BLACK, COLOR_WHITE, PATTERN_DIAGONAL, PATTERN_HORIZONTAL,
    PATTERN_CROSS, PATTERN_DOTS, get_project_root
)

setup_chart_style()

# Calculate for base case using Evidence-Based Conservative model: Age 30, $50K income, 1% Treaty
# NOTE: This is the CONSERVATIVE baseline (antibiotic precedent, 5yr life extension)
# For realistic estimates, see Disease Eradication Model ($2.4M-$5.8M, 34-106yr)
calc = calculate_personal_lifetime_wealth_conservative_baseline(
    treaty_pct=0.01,
    current_age=30,
    annual_income=50000,
    discount_rate=0.03,
    conservative=True  # Use conservative 5-year life extension
)

# Extract components
total = calc['total_lifetime_benefit']
components = [
    (f"Economic\nMultiplier\n(Milâ†’Res)\n${calc['npv_breakdown']['gdp_boost_benefit']/1000:.0f}K ({calc['npv_breakdown']['gdp_boost_benefit']/total*100:.0f}%)",
     calc['npv_breakdown']['gdp_boost_benefit']),
    (f"Extended\nEarnings\n${calc['npv_breakdown']['extended_earnings']/1000:.0f}K ({calc['npv_breakdown']['extended_earnings']/total*100:.0f}%)",
     calc['npv_breakdown']['extended_earnings']),
    (f"Productivity\nGains\n${calc['npv_breakdown']['productivity_gains_total']/1000:.0f}K ({calc['npv_breakdown']['productivity_gains_total']/total*100:.0f}%)",
     calc['npv_breakdown']['productivity_gains_total']),
    (f"Caregiver\nSavings\n${calc['npv_breakdown']['caregiver_savings_total']/1000:.0f}K ({calc['npv_breakdown']['caregiver_savings_total']/total*100:.0f}%)",
     calc['npv_breakdown']['caregiver_savings_total']),
    (f"Healthcare\nSavings\n${calc['npv_breakdown']['healthcare_savings_total']/1000:.0f}K ({calc['npv_breakdown']['healthcare_savings_total']/total*100:.0f}%)",
     calc['npv_breakdown']['healthcare_savings_total']),
]

labels = [c[0] for c in components]
sizes = [c[1] for c in components]

# Use patterns for distinction
patterns = [None, PATTERN_DIAGONAL, PATTERN_HORIZONTAL, PATTERN_CROSS, PATTERN_DOTS]

# Create figure
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 8))

# Create pie chart with white fills and patterns
wedges, texts = ax.pie(sizes, labels=labels, startangle=90,
                        counterclock=False,
                        wedgeprops={'edgecolor': COLOR_BLACK, 'linewidth': 2},
                        textprops={'fontsize': 12, 'weight': 'bold'})

# Apply patterns to wedges (white fill with black outline)
for i, wedge in enumerate(wedges):
    wedge.set_facecolor(COLOR_WHITE)
    wedge.set_hatch(patterns[i])
    if patterns[i]:
        wedge.set_hatch(patterns[i] * 3)  # Denser pattern

# Add title
ax.set_title('Where Does the $402K Come From?\nLifetime Wealth Component Breakdown (Age 30, $50K Income, 1% Treaty)',
             fontsize=32, weight='bold', pad=20)

# Add watermark
add_watermark(fig)

# Equal aspect ratio ensures circle
ax.axis('equal')

# Save figure
output_dir = get_project_root() / 'brain' / 'figures'
output_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
output_path = output_dir / 'conservative-baseline-lifetime-wealth-component-breakdown-pie-chart.png'

plt.savefig(output_path, dpi=200, bbox_inches=None, facecolor=COLOR_WHITE)

# Add metadata
add_png_metadata(
    output_path,
    title="Personal Lifetime Wealth Component Breakdown",
    description="Pie chart showing relative contribution of each benefit component"
)

plt.show()
```

**Key Finding:** Nearly half (49%) of the $402K comes from **healthcare savings** - reduced medical costs from better treatments and prevention. The second largest component (30%) is the **GDP growth boost** from compound economic growth.

**Note:** This is the conservative base case. The improved model (with 15-year life extension) would show extended earnings as the largest component at ~$450K.
